ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

function getUrl(cats,url1){
cats.split(',').forEach((i)=>{list.push(i+'::'+url1+i+'&query='+i+'&page={{page}}')});
}

getUrl(cat4,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=女频&status=完结&count=10&cate2=');
list.push('◎                        女生背景                        ◎::');
getUrl(cat5,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=女频&status=完结&count=10&tag_name=');
list.join('\n');
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    latest: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      ),
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
      
    ].join(','),
    latest:
      o.updteChapterName + ' • ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, '').replace(/^vip卷\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://book.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("EP99Mjk5Bc5jInLnKfUgRaOo0oZmUANFRDmyf05uTx8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
}

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
result=result.replace(/onclick="payChapter\('(.*?)','.*?',.*?\);"/g,'href="$1"');
doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
list=doc.select("#episodes a,#extra_episodes a");
if(String(list).match(/class="price_tag_icon">￥/)){
result=list
}else{
list=doc.select("#episodes a");
list2=doc.select("#extra_episodes a");
a=list.toArray().reverse().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
b=list2.toArray().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
result=a.concat(b)
}</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false

var json=java.getElement("@css:.volume-wrap h3,.volume-wrap li");
list=[];
for(i in json){
	vol=json[i].select("a").attr("class");
	if(vol.indexOf("subscri")!=-1){
		volname=json[i].text();
		list.push({
			text:"📖 [ "+String(volname).replace(/.共\d+章.*|.订阅本卷/g,'')+" ] 📖",
			voltype:true
			})
		}else{
a=json[i].select("a")
			vip=json[i].select("em.iconfont").text()!=""?"🔒":""
			
			text=a.text();
			href=a.attr("href");
			time=a.attr("alt");
			href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
			
			list.push({
			text:String(vip+text).replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推贺补].*/g,''),
			href:href,
			time:String(time).replace(/.*?时间：(.*?)章节字数：(\d+)/,'$1•$2字'),
			voltype:false
			})
	}
	}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var tmp, sid, id;
var text = '';
var alias = {
  'tophub.today': 'tophub-today',
  'daily.zhihu': 'zhihu-daily',
  hjenglish: 'hujiang-en'
};

if (baseUrl.includes('_id')) {
  sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  id = baseUrl.match(/[^_]id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
} else {
  for (var key in alias) {
    if (baseUrl.includes(key)) {
      sid = alias[key];
      break;
    }
  }
}

switch (sid) {
  case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
    tmp = java.ajax('https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv' + id);
    java.setContent(tmp);
    text = java.getString('class.article-holder@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'zhihu-daily': {
    text = java.getString('class.content@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'hujiang-en': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.article-content@html')).replace(
      /（翻译.+）|图片来源.+/g,
      ''
    );
    break;
  }
  case 'tophub-today': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.Zd-p-Sc@html'))
      .replace(
        //g,
        '\n.\n                      - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\n.\n'
      )
      .replace(/网页端只展示.+/, '');
    break;
  }
}

if (!text) {
  text = '｡◕‿◕｡' + (sid ? '\n' + sid : '');
}

text;

</js>

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var o = [];
if (!baseUrl.includes('debug')) {
  importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);

  var sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  var tmp, data;
  // title, author, tags, new, intro, cover, url
  var page = baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/);
  page = page ? page[1] : '';

  switch (sid) {
    case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
      // 哔哩哔哩专栏排行榜
      function toList(str) {
        var arr = JSON.parse(str).data;
        arr.forEach(a => {
          if (o.every(v => v.id !== a.id)) {
            o.push({
              id: a.id,
              title: a.title,
              author: a.author.name,
              tags: a.categories.map(v => v.name),
              intro: a.summary,
              new: a.dynamic,
              cover: a.banner_url,
              url: baseUrl + '&id=' + a.id
            });
          }
        });
      }
      var rankUrl = 'https://api.bilibili.com/x/article/rank/list?cid=';
      // 昨天
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '3');
      toList(tmp);

      // 前天
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '4');
      toList(tmp);

      // 周榜
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '2');
      toList(tmp);

      // 月榜
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '1');
      toList(tmp);

      break;
    }

    case 'zhihu-daily': {
      o = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://daily.zhihu.com'))
        .select('.main-content-wrap a')
        .toArray()
        .map(a => {
          var url = 'https://daily.zhihu.com' + a.attr('href');
          var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
          var author = J.select('.meta .author')
            .text()
            .replace('，', '');
          return {
            url: url,
            title: a.text(),
            cover: a.select('img').attr('src'),
            author: author,
            tags: [author],
            new: J.select('.meta .bio').text(),
            intro: J.select('.content p:first-child')
              .text()
              .trim()
          };
        })
        .filter(v => !v.title.includes('如何正确地吐槽'));
      break;
    }

    case 'hujiang-en': {
      var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com/fanyi/shuangyu';

      url += page ? '_' + page + '/' : '/';

      var groups = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url))
        .select('.left-content .sp-article-module')
        .toArray()
        .forEach(list => {
          var defaulCover = list.select('img').attr('data-src');
          list
            .select('a')
            .toArray()
            .forEach(a => {
              var title = a.text().replace('有声双语美文：', '');

              if (/1、优惠秒杀|英语课程/.test(title)) return;

              var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com' + a.attr('href');
              var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url)).select('.module-article');
              var cover = J.select('#J-article-content img:first-child').attr(
                'src'
              );
              cover = String(cover).trim();
              var content = J.select(
                '#J-article-content div[class*=langs]'
              ).html();
              var author = J.select('.info span:first-child').text();
              var trans = J.select('#J-article-content')
                .html()
                .match(/（(翻译：.+)）/);
              var tags = [author];
              if (trans) {
                tags.push(trans[1]);
              }
              o.push({
                cover: cover || defaulCover,
                title: title,
                url: url,
                author: author.replace('作者：', ''),
                tags: tags,
                new: J.select('.info span:nth-child(2)').text(),
                intro: content.slice(0, 500) + '...'
              });
            });
        });

      break;
    }

    case 'tophub-today': {
      var p = page ? '?p=' + page : '';
      var baseurl = 'https://tophub.today';

      function toList(url, nav) {
        var list = [];
        var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
        var tcs = J.select('.bc-tc').toArray();
        var ccs = J.select('.bc-cc').toArray();
        tcs.forEach((tc, i) => {
          var cc = ccs[i];
          var cds = cc.select('.cc-cd').toArray();
          cds.forEach(cd => {
            var title = cd.select('.cc-cd-lb').text();
            var tag = cd.select('.cc-cd-sb-st').text();
            var links = cd.select('.nano-content a').toArray();
            var intro = links
              .map((link, i) => i + 1 + '. ' + link.select('.t').text())
              .join('\n---\n');
            list.push({
              cover: cd.select('.cc-cd-lb img').attr('src'),
              title: title + ' - ' + tag,
              url: baseurl + cd.select('.cc-cd-is a').attr('href'),
              tags: [nav],
              new: cd.select('.i-h').text(),
              intro: intro
            });
          });
        });
        return list;
      }

      var navs = {
        综合: 'news',
        科技: 'tech',
        娱乐: 'ent',
        社区: 'community'
      };

      var lists = [];
      for (var name in navs) {
        var list = toList(baseurl + '/c/' + navs[name] + p, name);
        lists.push(list);
      }
      lists[0].forEach((v, i) => {
        lists.forEach((l, j) => {
          o.push(lists[j][i]);
        });
      });
    }
  }
}

o;

</js>
